description:
This is an introductory course in statistics. This course helps to serve as foundation for higher levels of statistics course namely descriptive & inferential statistics.

This course provides 8 video lectures and it also teaches you how meaning of statistics is different in singular and plural sense. It discusses in detail scope of statistics and its nature as a discipline.

The course is structured as follows:

  • Meaning of statistics
  • Nature & Scope of statistics
  • Types of data
  • Types of variable
  • Types of Statistics
  • Limitations of statistics

This course will teach you statistics in real sense and help you to remove your all doubts relating to statistics.
title: Learn Basic Statistics
